hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT sub.EBMGS_ID, sub.EBMGS_MATERIAL_GROUP_CODE, sub.EBMGS_CUSTOMER, sub.EBMGS_MATERIAL_CIASSIFICATION, sub.REC_VER, sub.MODIFY_TIME, sub.MODIFIER, sub.CREATE_TIME, sub.CREATOR, sub.EBMGS_CUSTOMER_NAME, sub.EBMGS_MATERIAL_NAME FROM EB_MATERIAL_GROUP_SUB sub left join EB_MATERIAL_GROUP subgroup on sub.EBMGS_MATERIAL_GROUP_CODE=subgroup.EBMG_MATERIAL_GROUP_CODE WHERE 1=1 <<AND sub.EBMGS_ID LIKE :ebmgsId>> <<AND sub.EBMGS_MATERIAL_GROUP_CODE LIKE :ebmgsMaterialGroupCode>> <<AND sub.EBMGS_CUSTOMER LIKE :ebmgsCustomer>> <<AND sub.EBMGS_MATERIAL_CIASSIFICATION LIKE :ebmgsMaterialCiassification>> <<AND sub.REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND sub.MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND sub.MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND sub.MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND sub.CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND sub.CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND sub.CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND sub.CREATE_TIME <= :ebmgsCustomerName >> <<AND sub.CREATOR LIKE :ebmgsMaterialName>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
